background.name: Field Medic
background.description:
__In the chaotic rush of battle, you learned to adapt to rapidly changing conditions as you administered to battle casualties. You patched up soldiers, guards, or other combatants, and learned a fair amount about the logistics of war.__
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
Youâ€™re trained in the Medicine skill and the Warfare Lore skill. You gain the (feat: Battle Medicine) skill feat.
